pages.text: A form of divination, tarot has long been seeped in mystery, being used by many to help reveal the obscure. Indeed, in the hands of a skilled witch the tarot may illuminate every facet of a player's life.$(br2)Tarot cards may be created by infusing paper using the $(thing)$(t:See book of magic)Ritual of Engraving.$()

To get a reading about yourself, you must Shift + Right Click with the cards in your hand. On  the other hand, to uncover secrets about another player simply right click them while holding the cards. $(br2)Then by placing the cards upon a Divination Table a witch will gain some insight into the unknown. Note that this knowledge comes at a cost, as $(l:magic_power/magical_energy)power$() needs to be drawn from a nearby source.
